name: Logic Blok
description:
Logic Blok is a brain using puzzle game. In this game, you need to move the white block around grey cubes platform reasonably, and make it pass through the green slot hole. The less moves the better score!

There are 14 interesting levels included. Each level build with different scene and buildings.

So guys, come and give a try, and see how less moves you used to complete the levels?

How to play:
- click and drag on the screen to move the blok
